artist: Designer: Charles G. Shepard; Designer: Peter Adams; Manufacturer: Shepard Hardware Company
description: brown horse with yellow saddle stands on rectangular box; horse's proper front right and and rear left leg on box; other two legs raised; coin slot below horse's mouth; a lever on box below horse's tail; "TRICK PONY" on 2 sides of box
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on bottom engraved: [PAT\'D (D is underlined) JUNE 2 D (D is underlined)  AND / July 7th  (th is underlined) 1885]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [# 272 - 16 1 (in circle) / x \"Trick Pony Bank\" / 65125 175 / 4210 / # 196 M]
title: "Trick Pony" mechanical bank
